text: Emilio Simeon Allué Carcasona, SDB (18 February 1935 – 26 April 2020) was a Spanish-American prelate of the Catholic Church. He was an auxiliary bishop of the Archdiocese of Boston until his retirement in 2010. He was born in Huesca, Spain. Allué died from COVID-19 in Boston on 26 April 2020, aged 85. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Massachusetts Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Spanish Roman Catholics Category:American Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Boston
title: Emilio S. Allué
